languages.text: "Я не..." {n}Вы впервые видите Мастера вокса настолько взбудораженной.{/n} "Я не пыталась его погладить. На пустотном корабле не принято держать подобных кибербестий, Лорд-капитан, это моя первая встреча с подобным созданием. Этот... Глейто, он следовал за мной по всему мостику..."

traits.locale_text: "Я не..." {n}Вы впервые видите вокс-мастера настолько взбудораженной.{/n} "Я не пыталась его погладить. На пустотном корабле не водятся собаки, Лорд-капитан, это моя первая встреча с подобной бестией. Этот... Глейто, он следовал за мной по всему мостику, прятался в тенях, сверкал своими люменами. Мы все были в замешательстве".

languages.text: "I didn't..." {n}This is the first time you have ever seen the Vox Master so agitated.{/n} "I did not try to pet him. It is not customary to keep such cyber-beasts on a voidship, Lord Captain — this is my first encounter with such a creature. That... Glaito, it was following me all over the bridge..."
languages.original_text: "Я не..." {n}Вы впервые видите Мастера вокса настолько взбудораженной.{/n} "Я не пыталась его погладить. На пустотном корабле не принято держать подобных кибербестий, Лорд-капитан, это моя первая встреча с подобным созданием. Этот... Глейто, он следовал за мной по всему мостику..."

It is not customary to keep such cyber-beasts on a voidship, Lord Captain — this is my first encounter with such a creature. That... Glaito, it was following me all over the bridge..."

It is not customary to keep such cyber-beasts on a voidship, Lord Captain — this is my first encounter with such a creature. That... Glaito, it was following me all over the bridge..."

languages.text: 「違います…」{n}ヴォクス・マスターがここまで動揺しているのを見るのは、これが初めてだった。{/n}「撫でようとしたわけではありません。ロード・キャプテン、サイバービーストを船内で飼うなど、通常では考えられないことです。あのような生き物と会ったのはこれが初めてです。あの…グライトとかいう犬が、ブリッジにいる間ずっと私のあとをつけてきたので…」
languages.original_text: "I didn't..." {n}This is the first time you have ever seen the Vox Master so agitated.{/n} "I did not try to pet him. It is not customary to keep such cyber-beasts on a voidship, Lord Captain — this is my first encounter with such a creature. That... Glaito, it was following me all over the bridge..."

traits.locale_text: 「違います…」{n}ヴォクス・マスターがここまで動揺しているのを見るのは、これが初めてだった。{/n}「撫でようとしたわけではありません。ロード・キャプテン、サイバービーストを船内で飼うなど、通常では考えられないことです。あのような生き物と会ったのはこれが初めてです。あの…グライトとかいう犬が、ブリッジにいる間ずっと私のあとをつけてきたので…」

languages.text: "Çalışmadım..." {n}Voks Üstadı'nı ilk kez bu kadar telaşlı görüyorsun.{/n} "Ben onu sevmeye falan çalışmadım. Bir uçsuz gemisinde böylesi siber hayvanların barındırılması, sıra dışı bir durum. Kaldı ki böylesi bir yaratıkla ilk kez karşılaşıyorum. Köpek... Glaito, köprüde peşimde dolanıyordu..."
languages.original_text: "I didn't..." {n}This is the first time you have ever seen the Vox Master so agitated.{/n} "I did not try to pet him. It is not customary to keep such cyber-beasts on a voidship, Lord Captain — this is my first encounter with such a creature. That... Glaito, it was following me all over the bridge..."

traits.locale_text: "Çalışmadım..." {n}Voks Üstadı'nı ilk kez bu kadar telaşlı bir hâlde görüyorsun.{/n} "Ben onu sevmeye falan çalışmadım. Bir uçsuz gemisinde böylesi siber canavarların barındırılması sıra dışı bir durum. Kaldı ki böylesi bir yaratıkla ilk kez karşılaşıyorum. Köpek... Glaito, köprü boyunca beni takip ediyordu...."

languages.text: «No he...». {n}Es la primera vez que ves tan agitada a la maestra de vocos.{/n} «No he intentado acariciarlo. No es habitual tener bestias cibernéticas como esa en una nave del vacío, Lord Capitán, y es mi primer encuentro con una. Ese... Glaito me estaba siguiendo por el puente...».
languages.original_text: "I didn't..." {n}This is the first time you have ever seen the Vox Master so agitated.{/n} "I did not try to pet him. It is not customary to keep such cyber-beasts on a voidship, Lord Captain — this is my first encounter with such a creature. That... Glaito, it was following me all over the bridge..."

traits.locale_text: «No he...». {n}Es la primera vez que ves tan agitada a la maestra de vocos.{/n} «No he intentado acariciarlo. No es habitual tener bestias cibernéticas como esa en una nave del vacío, Lord Capitán, y es mi primer encuentro con una. Ese... Glaito me estaba siguiendo por el puente...».

languages.text: “我才没有……”{n}这还是你第一次看到音阵大师如此恼怒。{/n}“我并没有试图去抚摸它。把这样的生化牲畜留在虚空舰上，这不符合飞船的惯例规定，舰长大人。这还是我第一次与这样的生物打交道，那条……格雷托，它在舰桥上一直跟着我……”
languages.original_text: "I didn't..." {n}This is the first time you have ever seen the Vox Master so agitated.{/n} "I did not try to pet him. It is not customary to keep such cyber-beasts on a voidship, Lord Captain — this is my first encounter with such a creature. That... Glaito, it was following me all over the bridge..."

traits.locale_text: “我才没有……”{n}这还是你第一次看到音阵大师如此恼怒。{/n}“我并没有试图去抚摸它。把这样的生化牲畜留在虚空舰上，这不符合飞船的惯例规定，舰长大人。这还是我第一次与这样的生物打交道，那条……格雷托，它在舰桥上一直跟着我……”

languages.text: « Je n'ai pas... {n}C'est la première fois que vous voyez la maîtresse-vox aussi agitée.{/n} Je n'ai pas essayé de le caresser. Il est rare de voir des cyber-créatures à bord d'un vaisseau, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. C'est la première fois que je rencontre une telle bête. Ce... Glaito, il me suivait d'un bout à l'autre de la passerelle... »
languages.original_text: "I didn't..." {n}This is the first time you have ever seen the Vox Master so agitated.{/n} "I did not try to pet him. It is not customary to keep such cyber-beasts on a voidship, Lord Captain — this is my first encounter with such a creature. That... Glaito, it was following me all over the bridge..."

traits.locale_text: « Je n'ai pas... {n}C'est la première fois que vous voyez la maîtresse-vox aussi agitée.{/n} Je n'ai pas essayé de le caresser. Il est rare de voir des cyber-créatures à bord d'un vaisseau, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. C'est la première fois que je rencontre une telle bête. Ce... Glaito, il me suivait d'un bout à l'autre de la passerelle... »

languages.text: "Ich habe nicht ..." {n}Du hast die Voxmeisterin noch nie derart aufgewühlt gesehen.{/n} "Ich habe nicht versucht, ihn zu streicheln. Derartige Cyber-Biester sind auf einem Raumschiff nicht üblich, Lord Captain ... das ist meine erste Begegnung mit einer solchen Kreatur. Das ... Glaito, ist mir über die ganze Brücke gefolgt ..."
languages.original_text: "I didn't..." {n}This is the first time you have ever seen the Vox Master so agitated.{/n} "I did not try to pet him. It is not customary to keep such cyber-beasts on a voidship, Lord Captain — this is my first encounter with such a creature. That... Glaito, it was following me all over the bridge..."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe nicht ..." {n}Du hast die Voxmeisterin noch nie derart aufgewühlt gesehen.{/n} "Ich habe nicht versucht, ihn zu streicheln. Derartige Cyber-Biester sind auf einem Raumschiff nicht üblich, Lord Captain ... das ist meine erste Begegnung mit einer solchen Kreatur. Das ... Glaito, ist mir über die ganze Brücke gefolgt ..."
